meanings.definition: Having a label or labels attached.
meanings.sent1: The labellate box was easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The labellate jars on the shelf were neatly organized.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a labellate superhero with my name tag on my chest.
meanings.sent4: Her labellate backpack stood out in the sea of plain bags.
meanings.sent5: The labellate sign above the door guided us to the right room.

meanings.definition: To attach a label or labels to something.
meanings.sent1: She labellated each folder with care.
meanings.sent2: Please labellate the boxes before storing them.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to labellate their toys for fun.
meanings.sent4: He labellated the map to mark the important locations.
meanings.sent5: Remember to labellate the packages for shipping.
